QuestData.Title: Tome of Tears
QuestData.Description:
We've been fighting side by side for a while now. I didn't think an old salt like me could get any better at killing naga, but here we are.
I have something to show you...
<Vim produces a book from his pack.>
Worst thing we can do is forget.
So many names I've written in this book, each and every one of them an Unshackled. All of them gone, now.
I will never forget their names.
I want you to have it. Tell people. Tell them who they were, and what we have done here.
QuestData.LogDescription: Accept a gift from your companion.
